description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              **Responsibilities
              
              •	Review user requirements and technical specifications
              
              •	Ensure open questions about requirements get resolved
              
              •	Breakdown features and design test plan
              
              •	Design test cases
              
              •	Prepare test environments & data
              
              •	Run test cases
              
              •	Report bugs and negotiate resolutions with project team
              
              •	Duplicate bugs found in production
              

              **Benefits
              
              •	Competitive pay
              
              •	Fun working environment (Free lunches, naps, company trips, and more)
              
              •	Challenging projects
              
              •	Opportunity to make a difference
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              **Requirement
              
              •	Bachelor's degree in Computer Science/IT
              
              •	3+ years working as a software tester
              
              •	Strong at reading and writing English
              
              •	Strong communication & soft skills
              
              •	Can quickly learn new technologies
              
              •	Can work well independently and on a team
              

              **Desirable
              
              •	Experience with automated testing tools (Selenium)
              
              •	Experience with SQL Server & writing SQL queries
              
              •	Able to code in one or more programming languages
              
              •	Experience testing web services & APIs
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
phuc-loi:
Các Phúc Lợi Dành Cho Bạn
             








                13th salary is paid before Lunar New Year
               







                Good health care & insurance programs for all employees

skill: Automation Test/ Manual Test/ Auto Test
